abstract: Lawyers and lobbyists are gearing up for another round of attacks against the Volcker Rule. | Documents shed new light on JPMorgan Chase’s hiring in China. | The owner of the Freedom Group is planning to give other investors in the company a way to cash out. | Comcast has hired JPMorgan to advise it on a possible bid for Time Warner Cable.
snippet: Lawyers and lobbyists are gearing up for another round of attacks against the Volcker Rule. | Documents shed new light on JPMorgan Chase’s hiring in China. | The owner of the Freedom Group is planning to give other investors in the company a way t...
lead_paragraph: Five regulatory agencies are preparing to vote on Tuesday on a final draft of the Volcker Rule, the regulation that seeks to rein in risk-taking on Wall Street. But lawyers and lobbyists are gearing up for another round of attacks against it, Matthew Goldstein and Ben Protess report in DealBook.

headline.main: Fresh Attacks on the Volcker Rule
